snippet: To portray the lead in his latest film, “Casa de Mi Padre,” Will Ferrell was a reluctant student when it came to studying his lines in Spanish.
abstract: Casa de Mi Padre, directed by Matt Piedmont, is modeled after popular telenovelas and is entirely in Spanish with English subtitles; star Will Ferrell had to brush up on the language, but part of the humor in the film is his bad grasp of Spanish.
lead_paragraph: To portray the lead in his latest film, “Casa de Mi Padre,” Will Ferrell was a reluctant student when it came to studying his lines in Spanish.
